sections.MISSION:
SHADOW PLT conducts Situational Training Exercise (STX) 09-10 MAY 2024 on PA 256-N IOT increase squad cohesion and lethality.
Commanderâ€™s
sections.PURPOSE:
of this training is to expand the overall knowledge and expertise of all members of Shadow Platoon. Key Task: Conduct classroom and practical exercises reacting to contact OP operations and emplacing ambush.
Conduct force on force STX lane encompassing all aspects of previous training.
sections.END STATE:
All members of Shadow Platoon are trained and proficient in each key task trained.
Training Objectives
Increase tactical expertise of Shadow PLT at the Squad and Individual level
Observation post and PED7 class
Emplacement of OPS
Ambush Class
Practical exercise for ambush React to contact mounted and dismounted
Practical exercise
Force on force event
